meta.description: This Advene standard package define views to export annotations to various formats.
meta.title: Export package

150; var voffset = 30; var zoom = 1; var scale_layout; var annotations_layout; var time_marker; function setYScale(s) { function transform_string(vscale, hoff, voff) { if (vscale === undefined) vscale = 1; if (hoff === undefined) hoff = 0; if (voff === undefined) voff = 0; return "translate(" + hoff + " " + voff + ") scale(" + s + " 1)"; } if (! scale_layout) scale_layout = document.getElementById("scale_layout"); if (scale_layout) scale_layout.setAttribute("transform", transform_string(s, hoffset)); if (! annotations_layout) annotations_layout = document.getElementById("annotations_layout"); if (annotations_layout) annotations_layout.setAttribute("transform", transform_string(s, hoffset, voffset)); if (! time_marker) time_marker = document.getElementById("time_marker"); if (time_marker) time_marker.setAttribute("stroke-width", (2 / s) + "px") zoom = s; } function zoomIn(evt) { setYScale(zoom * 1.1); } function zoomOut(evt) { setYScale(zoom / 1.1); } function svg_init() { var svg = document.getElementsByTagName("svg")[0]; console.log("Setting zoom to " + 1.0 * window.innerWidth / svg.width.baseVal.value); setYScale(1.0 * window.innerWidth / svg.width.baseVal.value); } function onLoadHandler(init_fxn) { var old_init = window.onload; var new_init = init_fxn; window.onload = function() { if (typeof(old_init) == "function") { old_init(); } new_init(); } return this; } onLoadHandler(svg_init); - + Timestamp Titre Texte
Begin_ms End_ms Duration_ms Begin End Type Content Begin End Duration Begin End Title Content

About this export_views package

This package provides some views that can be used to export some package data to another format. Currently supported formats are

  • SMIL : a basic SMIL rendering of annotations. It can be applied to a package.
  • SRT subtitles : subtitles in the SRT format (used by some video players).
  • SVG : all annotations on a timeline, in a graphical representation
  • spreadsheet : a tab-separated-value conversion.

You can either import the export_views package (through the Edit/Package imports menu), or copy/paste the contents of a view into one of your own views, to adapt if better to your needs.

Note about exporter definition

Export views can be applied either to a whole package, or to an annotation-type. The MatchFilter class attribute is used to discriminate this: it is either 'package' for exporters which only handle full packages, or '*' for exporters which handle both packages and annotation-types.
